tags.name: Messaging Campaign API
tags.description: API resources for sending multiple messages or campaigns

tags.description: API resources to get which countries are enabled for the quiet hours feature

tags.description: API resources for managing contact groups and segments

tags.description: API resources for managing contact labels

tags.description: API resources for handling blacklists for your contacts

tags.name: Account API
tags.description: API resources for managing your Routee accounts

tags.name: Reports API
tags.description: API resources for getting reports for all Routee services

post.description: creates a new verification and sends the message to the recipient

200.description: The new verification

200.description: OK

200.description: OK

200.description: OK

options.description: retrieves the report for the logged in account

200.description: OK

patch.description: retrieves the report for the logged in account

200.description: OK

200.description: OK

put.description: retrieves the report for a specific application

patch.description: retrieves the report for a specific application

get.summary: verification status
get.description: Retrieves the status of an existing verification

200.description: The status of the verification

404.description: In the verification with the given id is not found

post.description: checks the answer to complete the verification proccess

200.description: The new status of the verification

400.description: In case the provided answer is wrong

404.description: In the verification with the given id is not found

200.description: The new status of the verification

400.description: In the verification is not in pending status

404.description: In the verification with the given id is not found

get.summary: account balance
get.description: Retrieves the balance for the currently logged account

200.description: The balance of the current account

get.summary: bank accounts
get.description: Retrieves the available bank accounts for the account

200.description: The balance of the current account

get.summary: get transactions
get.description: Retrieve all transactions of the logged in master account.

200.description: The transactions of the master account

get.summary: Campaign
get.description: Returns a campaign

200.description: The campaign

404.description: In case the campaign was not found

get.summary: All contact fields for the account of the user who performed the request
get.description: Returns all fields, default and custom. It is map with the field name as key and the field data type as value

200.description: The fields of the account

post.summary: Creates contact fields definitions on the account that the user performed the request
post.description: Returns all newly created field definitions. It is a collection, where each entry contains the field name and the field data type as properties

200.description: The newly created field definitions for the current account

400.description: Duplicate field name found within the request

get.summary: My contacts based on pagination criteria
get.description: Retrieves the contacts of the current account

200.description: The group of contacts with pagination information

post.description: Creates a new contact associated with the account of the current user

200.description: The details of the newly created contact

409.description: Some Custom fields share the same name

delete.description: Deletes multiple contacts of the current user

200.description: A set with the deleted contact ids

get.summary: Gets all the contacts which are blacklisted for the specified service
get.description: Gets a collection of contacts

200.description: The collection of blacklisted contacts

post.summary: Add multiple contacts to the blacklist of a specific service

200.description: The details of the deleted contact

delete.summary: Remove one or more contacts from the blacklist of a specific service
delete.description: Removes the contacts from the blacklist

200.description: The number of the updated contact

delete.summary: Removes contacts from the blacklist of a specific service that belong to the given groups

200.description: The number of the affected contacts

head.description: Determines whether a contact with the provided mobile exists

200.description: If a contact with the mobile exists

get.summary: One of my contacts based on the contact's id
get.description: Retrieved one of the contacts of the current account

200.description: The retrieved contact

put.description: Updates a contact of the current user

200.description: The details of the updated contact

409.description: Some Custom labels share the same name

delete.summary: Delete a contact based on id
delete.description: Deletes a contact of the current user

200.description: The details of the deleted contact

get.summary: All of the account's contact groups
get.description: Retrieves the available group tags of an account

200.description: The contact groups and the number of contacts in each group

post.summary: Adds a new contact group tag to the account
post.description: Creates and adds a new group tag to the associated account

200.description: The group has been successfully created

delete.description: Based on a url parameter this call either deletes the contact group tag or both the contact group tag and the contacts associated with it

200.description: The group has been successfully removed

post.summary: Creates a new group to the account from the difference of a group of existing groups
post.description: Creates a new group by the difference of the given existing groups

200.description: The group has been successfully created

404.description: One of the groups was not found

post.summary: Creates a new group to the account from the merge of a group of existing groups
post.description: Creates a new group by merging given existing groups

200.description: The group has been successfully merged

404.description: One of the groups was not found

get.summary: A page of the account's contact groups
get.description: Retrieves a page of the available group tags of an account

200.description: The contact groups and the number of contacts in each group

get.summary: Fetch a contact group
get.description: This endpoint fetches the given contact list with the number of contacts in it

200.description: The group has been successfully removed

get.summary: Gets the contacts of a contact group
get.description: Retrieves all the contacts marked by the specified group tag

200.description: The contacts have been fetched successfully

post.summary: Adds contacts to a contact group
post.description: Adds a set of contacts to the specified contact group

200.description: The contacts have been updated

delete.summary: Removes the contacts from the group

200.description: The contacts have been removed from the group

get.summary: lookup delivery report
get.description: Returns the delivery report of a single lookup specified by the lookupId

200.description: The Lookup info

get.summary: The sms latency report for a given account
get.description: Aggregates the sms count per life span for the specified date range

200.description: The sms latency report for the current account

get.summary: The sms latency report for a given campaign id
get.description: Aggregates the sms count per life span for the specified date range and campaign id

200.description: The sms latency report for the current account

get.summary: The sms latency report for a given account
get.description: Aggregates the sms count per life span for the specified date range

200.description: The sms latency report for the current account

get.summary: The sms latency report for a given account
get.description: Aggregates the sms count per life span for the specified date range

200.description: The sms latency report for the current account

get.summary: The volume and price report, grouped by date, for a given date range
get.description: Aggregates the lookup HLR counts and costs for the specified date range

200.description: The volume and price report for the current account

get.summary: The volume and price report for a given account
get.description: Aggregates the sms counts and costs for the specified date range

200.description: The report for the current account

get.summary: The volume and price report for a given campaign id
get.description: Aggregates the sms counts and costs for the specified date range for the campaign id

200.description: The report for the current account

get.summary: The volume and price report for a given account and a given country
get.description: Aggregates the sms counts and costs for the specified date range for the given country

200.description: The report for the current account

get.summary: The volume and price report for a given account, a given country and a given operator
get.description: Aggregates the sms counts and costs for the specified date range for the given country-operator

200.description: The report for the current account

200.description: OK

get.summary: SmsTracking
get.description: Returns sms tracking data for messages included in a specific campaign

200.description: OK

name.description: The name of the new group to be created.

GroupMergeDto.description: Contains the tags of the groups that will be merged and the tag of the new group

SmsNetworkPriceDto.description: Sms Price for a specific network

SmsCountryPriceTableDto.description: Contains basic information about the country along with the network prices

deliveredCount.description: The count of the delivered messages

failedCount.description: The count of the failed messages

price.description: The total price for the total sms of this report for the customer

queuedCount.description: The count of the queued messages

sentCount.description: The count of the sent messages

smsCampaignId.description: The campaign id of this report

startDateTime.description: The starting date and time from which this report was generated

timeGrouping.description: The grouping used in this report

undeliveredCount.description: The count of the undelivered messages

unsentCount.description: The count of the insufficient balance messages

VolPriceStatisticReportDto.description: Contains the analytics for a range of messages associated with the account id

message.description: The transcoded message of the original unicode message

parts.description: The number of actual sms that will be sent

TranscodeDto.description: Contains information for the transcoded body of an sms message

code.description: The currency code in ISO 4217 format

localeName.description: The currency name translated in its native language

name.description: The currency name translated in the requested language

createdAt.description: The time the campaign was created

respectQuietHours.description: Indicates if the sms should respects the quiet hours, default value: false

trackingId.description: The tracking number of the campaign

type.description: The service type of the campaign

absentCount.description: The count of the absent HLR lookup records

activeCount.description: The count of the active HLR lookup records

count.description: The count for the HLR lookup records of this report

failedCount.description: The count of the failed HLR lookup records

price.description: The price for the HLR lookup records of this report

queuedCount.description: The count of the queued HLR lookup records

startDateTime.description: The starting date and time from which this report was generated

unknownCount.description: The count of the unknown HLR lookup records

LookupBreakdownReportInfoDto.description: Contains the details analytics for a range of HLR lookup records associated with the account id

code.description: The country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format

isoA3Code.description: The code of the country in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format

localeName.description: The country name translated in its native language

name.description: The country name translated in the requested language

smsLatencyCount.description: A collection containing the count of the sms delivered by their latency

SmsLatencyReportDto.description: Contains the sms latency array for specific matching criteria

code.description: The country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format

isoA3Code.description: The code of the country in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format

localeName.description: The country name translated in its native language

name.description: The country name translated in the requested language

supported.description: Indicates if the country is supported by the quiet hours feature

QuietHourCountryDto.description: Contains information for an sms message after being analyzed

blacklisted.description: If the contact is in blacklist (he will not receive a message)

recipientCountry.description: The country of the recipient extracted by the country code

ContactRecipientInfoDto.description: Contains information about a contact after being analyzed

size.description: The size of the group (number of contacts)

ContactGroupDto.description: Contains the group  name and the total count of contacts in the group

strategy.description: When the URL will be called, on every status change (OnChange) or when a final status arrives (OnCompletion)

url.description: The URL that will be called when an update occurs

mnc.description: The code of the number's ported network

name.description: The name of the number's ported network

LookupNetworkDto.description: Represents the information about the look up number network

perCountry.description: The total number of requests send, grouped by country and by status

total.description: The total number of requests send

totals.description: The total number of requests send grouped by status

TwoStepReportDto.description: A report that represents the number of verification requests per statusand by country and status, send by a specific application.

name.description: The name of the custom field

type.description: The type of the custom field. Supported types are : Text, Date or Number

value.description: The value of the custom field

ContactLabelDto.description: Contains the name, the value and the type of a contact's custom field.

country.description: The country name of the roaming network

countryIsoCode.description: The country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format

mcc.description: The country code of the roaming network

mnc.description: The network code of the roaming network

network.description: The network name of the roaming network

state.description: Indicates if the number is in roaming mode

LookupRoamingDto.description: Information about the ported network and the country of the number that the lookup request is performed

lifetimeInSeconds.description: Indicates the number of seconds that the verification will be valid, when that time passes the user will not be able to confirm the request

maxRetries.description: The number of times the user is allowed to enter a wrong answer before the verification becomes invalid

BalanceChangeDto.description: Represents a change to the balance after successfully adding a transaction

date.description: The date that the status was reported

reason.description: An extra reason for the status

SmsStatusDto.description: Represents a status for an sms

deletedContacts.description: Defines whether the contacts of the group have been deleted or not

name.description: The tag of the group that has been deleted

GroupDeleteResponseDto.description: Contains the deleted tag and whether its contacts have been deleted

minutesAfter.description: The minutes after the scheduled date (that the sms will be send) that the test sms will be send

minutesBefore.description: The minutes before the scheduled date (that the sms will be send) that the test sms will be send

to.description: The recipients of this sms that will get a test sms before and/or after the campaign will start. Must be a list with valid mobile numbers starting with + and the country code

SmsTestCampaignDto.description: Represents a test sms that will be send before and/or after the actual sms

fieldName.description: Defines the name of the field for this filter

searchOperator.description: Defines the search operator to be used for the search. Examples: is, is_not, contains, starts_with, ends_with

searchTerm.description: Defines the search term to be used for the search

SearchFilterDto.description: Contains the field and term information for a search filter

status.description:
The status of the verification. 
Pending: When the verification is created and is waiting for a confirmation, 
Verified: A correct answer was provided, 
Cancelled: The verification was cancelled,
Expired: The verification is expired,
Failed: A wrong answer was provided

updatedAt.description: The date that this verification was update

VerificationStatusDto.description: Represents status information about a verification request

timeGrouping.description: The grouping used in this report

LookupBreakdownReportSummaryDto.description: Contains the totals analytics for a range of HLR lookup records associated with the account id

name.description: The name of the custom field

type.description: The type of the custom field. Supported types are : Text, Date or Number

LabelDefinitionDto.description: Contains the name and the type of a contact's custom field definition.

minAmount.description: The min amount to transfer money to this bank

swiftCode.description: The swift code of the bank

description.description: A more descriptive information about the status of the request

status.description: The status of the look up request

updatedAt.description: The date that the request's status has been updated

LookupStatusInfo.description: Information about the status related to the given mobile number after the lookup service is performed.

balanceAfter.description: The amount of balance that the account had after the processing of the action

balanceBefore.description: The amount of balance that the account had before the action was processed

date.description: The date that the action was created

status.description: The status of the action (Completed, Pending)

type.description: The type of the action (Paid, Credit, ChangeStatus, Remove, Refund)

callback.description: Defines the notification callback information for an individual message progress of the SMS campaign.

flash.description: Indicates if the sms is a flash sms, default value: false

from.description: The sender id for this sms

label.description: A generic label using for tagging the sms

to.description: The recipient of this sms, must be a list with valid mobile numbers starting with + and the country code

SmsRequestDto.description: Represents a request for sending a single sms

blacklistedServices.description: Defines all the services for which the contact has been blacklisted

country.description: The Country information of the contact

email.description: The e-mail address of the contact

firstName.description: The first name of the contact

groups.description: All contact groups that belong to this Contact

labels.description: Contains the contact's custom fields with their respective values

lastName.description: The last name of the contact

mobile.description: The mobile number of the contact

vip.description: Indicates whether the contact is treated as vip or not

ContactDto.description: Represents an single contact of an account of the application

banks.description: The available banks for this entity

vatId.description: The vat id of the entity

PricingEntityDto.description: Represents the a pricing entity with the available banks

applicationName.description: The name of the application which executed the lookup

createdAt.description: The date that the look up request was performed

details.description: Details about the country of the number that the look up request is performed

groups.description: All contact groups that belong to this LookupTracking

label.description: The label that the user may has provided when the llokup service was called

price.description: The price of the Lookup Operation

statusInfo.description: Information about the lookup request status

to.description: The number for which the lookup service was called

LookupTrackingDto.description: Represents the information about the look up number

callback.description: Defines the notification callback information for an individual message progress of the SMS campaign.

campaignCallback.description: Defines the notification callback information for updates about the SMS campaign progress.

cost.description: The cost of the campaign. If the campaign is running then the cost is constantly updated when a new sms is sent

createdAt.description: The time the campaign was created

endedAt.description: The time the campaign was processed and all messages left from Routee.

fallbackValues.description: Defines the default values when the sms campaign has bonus fields, in case a contact does not contain any of these fields

flash.description: Indicates if the sms is a flash sms

reminder.description: Defines the recipients that will receive a test sms before and/or after the actual sms will be send

respectQuietHours.description: Indicates if the sms should respects the quiet hours, default value: false

scheduledDate.description: The time the campaign was scheduled to run

smsAnalysis.description: The analysis data for this sms

statuses.description: Defines the number of sms per message status

totalMessages.description: The actual sms messages that will be sent

trackingId.description: The tracking number of the campaign

type.description: The service type of the campaign

SmsCampaignDto.description: Represents a status for an Sms campaign

label.description: A generic label using for tagging the number

to.description: The number that the hlr service will use

LookupRequestDto.description: Represents the information required to perform the look up

bodyAnalysis.description: The analysis data for this sms

callback.description: Defines the notification callback information for an individual message progress of the SMS campaign.

createdAt.description: The time that the SMS was created

flash.description: Indicates if the sms is a flash sms

label.description: A generic label using for tagging the sms

SmsDto.description: Represents a status for a single Sms

filters.description: The filters to apply and create the group from their result

name.description: The name of the group to be created.

strategy.description: Defines the way that the group should be populated. If not set (or set to 'None') the group will be empty.If it's set to 'Filtered' the group will be populated based on the filters provided. If it's set to 'All', the groupwill include all the contacts of the account.

GroupCreationDto.description: Contains the tag of the new group and the criteria to define its contacts (contact collection or filters)

applicationName.description: The name of the application which executed the lookup

createdAt.description: The date that the look up request was performed

details.description: Details about the country of the number that the look up request is performed

groups.description: All contact groups that belong to this LookupTracking

label.description: The label that the user may has provided when the llokup service was called

statusInfo.description: Information about the lookup request status

to.description: The number for which the lookup service was called

LookupResponseDto.description: Represents the information about the look up number

actions.description: All the actions of this transaction

balanceAfter.description: The amount of balance that the account had after the processing of the transaction

balanceBefore.description: The amount of balance that the account had before the transaction was processed

date.description: The date that the transaction was created

source.description: The source that initiated this transaction (e.g. Paypal)

status.description: The status of the transaction (PendingNotCredited, Pending, Completed)

transactionType.description: The type of the transaction (always TopUp)

currency.description: The currency of all the prices

lookup.description: The price list for lookup service

sms.description: The price list for sms service

PriceTableDto.description: Contains a price list for each service

parts.description: The number of actual sms that will be sent

transcode.description: Contains information for the transcoded body of the sms message

unicode.description: Indicates if the body contains unicode characters

unsupportedGSMCharacters.description: Which characters caused the message to be considered as unicode

SmsBodyAnalysisDto.description: Contains information for a body of an sms message after being analyzed

bodyAnalysis.description: The analysis for the body of the sms.

contacts.description: For each contact the details (ContactRecipientInfoDto) of the contact

recipientCountries.description: For each recipient the country that the mobile belongs to (country format in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

recipientsPerCountry.description: The total recipients per country (country format in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

recipientsPerGroup.description: For each group the number of recipients that it contains without the blacklisted contacts

totalInGroups.description: The total number of recipients in all given lists excluding the ones already specified and the blacklisted

SmsCampaignAnalysisDto.description: Contains information for an sms campaign after being analyzed

applicationName.description: The name of the application that was used to send this message

campaignName.description: The name of the campaign that this message was send from

direction.description: The direction of the message (Outbound, Inbound)

groups.description: The lists that the recipient belongs

label.description: A generic label using for tagging the sms

latency.description: The overall delivery latency of the message

originatingService.description: The service that send this message

smsId.description: The id of one of the sms parts included in a message

status.description: The status of the sms tracking

SmsTrackingDto.description: Represents a tracking for a specific sms

country.description: The country of the specified number

imsi.description: Is used to identify the user of a cellular network and is a unique identification associated with all cellular networks

mcc.description: The country code of the specified number

msiddn.description: The number uniquely identifying a subscription in a GSM or a UMTS mobile network

network.description: Details about the network of the number that the look up request is performed

ported.description: Indicates if the number's network has changed

portedNetwork.description: Information about the ported network's code and name

LookupDetailsDto.description: Represents information for the country of the specified number

callback.description: Defines the notification callback information for an individual message progress of the SMS campaign.

campaignCallback.description: Defines the notification callback information for updates about the SMS campaign progress.

contacts.description: The contacts of this sms, must be a list with valid contact ids

fallbackValues.description: Defines the default values when the sms campaign has bonus fields, in case a contact does not contain any of these fields

flash.description: Indicates if the sms is a flash sms, default value: false

from.description: The sender id for this sms

groups.description: The lists of this sms, must be a list with valid group names

reminder.description: Defines the recipients that will receive a test sms before and/or after the actual sms will be send

respectQuietHours.description: Indicates if the sms should respect the quiet hours, default value: false

scheduledDate.description: The future date that the sms campaign will be executed at

to.description: The recipients of this sms, must be a list with valid mobile numbers starting with + and the country code

CampaignSmsRequestDto.description: Represents a request for sending an sms campaign

LookupBreakdownReportDto.description: Contains the analytics for a range of HLR lookup records associated with the account id

arguments.description: A list of arguments for the template message.For example, if the template message contains an @@name and a name:john is send as an argument the @@name will be replaced with john

recipient.description: The recipient to send the sms message to (must be a valid phone number)

template.description: The template to send to the user, if not provided the appropriate template from the settings will be send. The template must contain the @@pin that will be replaced by the generated code

templateCountry.description: The country that will be used to select the appropriate template (if a template wasn't specified in this request).If not provided the country will be exported from the recipient mobile number

VerificationDto.description: A verification request. When send it will initiate the two step verification process

BalanceDto.description: Represents the balance of an Account

bodyAnalysis.description: The analysis for the body of the sms.

SmsAnalysisDto.description: Contains information for an sms message after being analyzed
